Collaboration for teams

LayoutNode.Content: A smarter way to work together
LayoutNode.SRC: A smarter way to work together

LayoutNode.Content: Plan, build, review, and ship software at work—all while tracking bugs and discussing ideas.
LayoutNode.SRC: Plan, build, review, and ship software at work—all while tracking bugs and discussing ideas.

LayoutNode.Content: Have conversations next to your code
LayoutNode.SRC: Have conversations next to your code

LayoutNode.Content: You don’t have to switch tools to review code, share input on projects, or open up theconversation to the rest of your team.
LayoutNode.SRC: You don’t have to switch tools to review code, share input on projects, or open up the conversation to the rest of your team.

LayoutNode.Content: Learn more about reviewing code on GitHub →
LayoutNode.SRC: Learn more about reviewing code on GitHub →
Discover and reuse code

LayoutNode.Content: Search across projects and issues to find and reuse code your teammates havewritten. Improve it along the way, and everyone wins.
LayoutNode.SRC: Search across projects and issues to find and reuse code your teammates have written. Improve it along the way, and everyone wins.
Find and fix issues faster

LayoutNode.Content: Greater visibility into your team’s code helps you squash bugs before they make it toproduction. And with integrated issue tracking, you can keep your team on topof fixes.
LayoutNode.SRC: Greater visibility into your team’s code helps you squash bugs before they make it to production. And with integrated issue tracking, you can keep your team on top of fixes.

Security
Security without compromise

LayoutNode.Content: Enforcing your security policies doesn’t have to complicate the way you work. Develop softwareaccording to your team’s needs without overburdening your process.
LayoutNode.SRC: Enforcing your security policies doesn’t have to complicate the way you work. Develop software according to your team’s needs without overburdening your process.

LayoutNode.Content: Support critical policies Know who authored code or pushed a commit, automatecompliance workflows, and protect branches from accidentalchanges.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Support critical policies

Know who authored code or pushed a commit, automate compliance workflows, and protect branches from accidental changes.

LayoutNode.Content: Choose your authentication method Encourage teamwork while enforcing essential controls for employees and contractors with support for two-factor authentication and SAML single sign-on .
LayoutNode.SRC:

LayoutNode.SRC:

Help developers work better together with data from audits and monitoring dashboards.

LayoutNode.Content: Need more to support your security and administrative policies? Deploy GitHub Enterprise on your own servers or in a private cloud for enterprise-grade security .

Administration
Effortless administration

LayoutNode.Content: Growing your team should be exciting, not distracting. We’ve made setup and scaling easy so youcan focus on what counts.
LayoutNode.SRC: Growing your team should be exciting, not distracting. We’ve made setup and scaling easy so you can focus on what counts.

LayoutNode.Content: Get started faster With easy setup and onboarding, your team will be writing code, fixingbugs, and bringing the next big idea to life in no time. Grow your team Whether you’re a team of two or an organization of thousands,onboarding and managing users is hassle-free. Give the right amount of access Teams can access exactly what they need to do their work with GitHubteams, organizations, and centralized permissions. Customize with APIs Make GitHub your own with customizations that ensure quality, reducerisk, and integrate trusted apps. See what’s possible with APIs →
LayoutNode.SRC:
Get started faster

With easy setup and onboarding, your team will be writing code, fixing bugs, and bringing the next big idea to life in no time.

Grow your team

Whether you’re a team of two or an organization of thousands, onboarding and managing users is hassle-free.

Give the right amount of access

Teams can access exactly what they need to do their work with GitHub teams, organizations, and centralized permissions.

Customize with APIs

Make GitHub your own with customizations that ensure quality, reduce risk, and integrate trusted apps.
